metadata.description: A 15x6m mural portrait of legendary footballer Andrea Pirlo painted on Lafayette Street 188 in Manhattan, New York. This NFT contains ownership of the physical mural for one year before it will disappear, a digital image of the finished mural as a memento, and a unique 1x1 Sandbox Land with a recreation of Lafayette Street complete with mural and Pirlo visitor. Street art that will live forever in the Metaverse.
metadata.name: Maestro
